text: Mariah Carey ’ s botched New Year ’ s Eve performance was NOT caused by drugs and alcohol, despite a bogus tabloid report. Gossip Cop can exclusively debunk this claim. We ’ re told it ’ s not true. According to the National Enquirer, the singer ’ s friends fear she ’ s headed for a meltdown following the New Year ’ s fiasco, during which technical difficulties interfered with Carey ’ s set. A so - called “ source, ” however, tells the magazine that the singer mixed a combination of booze, prescription medications and marijuana prior to going on stage in Times Square, which caused her to fumble her performance. “ Mariah seems to be paranoid and delusional, thinking that everyone is out to get her, ” says the magazine
